import React, { useEffect , useState} from 'react'; import '../Home.css'; // import Pages from '../Pages/Pages'; import Pricing from '../../Login/Pricing'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { resetSocialMediaSelections, } from '../../../redux/actions/socialMediaActions'; import { getPricingInfos, detectCurrency } from '../../../redux/actions/billingActions'; import moment from 'moment'; import { Row, Col, Table, Image, Dropdown, } from 'react-bootstrap'; // Translations import { trans } from '../../../Translations'; import { FaInfoCircle } from 'react-icons/fa'; const INSTA_ICON = require('../../../assets/images/home/slider-instagram.svg'); const FB_ICON = require('../../../assets/images/home/slider-facebook.svg'); const USER_ICON = require('../../../assets/images/login/price-user.svg'); const CHECKBOX_ICON = require('../../../assets/images/login/price-checkbox.svg'); function Billing(props) { let { lang, socialMediaPageSelected, pricingInfos, currency, // Functions: detectCurrency, getPricingInfos, } = props; const [showPopover, setShowPopover] = useState(false); const [choice, setChoice] = useState({ id:"plan", value: trans[lang].billing.billingPlan}); const renderPopover = () => (
setShowPopover(true)} onMouseLeave={() => setShowPopover(false)}>

{trans[lang].billing.infoPopover}

); const handlePopover = (delay) => { setTimeout( () => { setShowPopover(!showPopover); },delay) }; useEffect(() => { detectCurrency() .then(() => { getPricingInfos(); }) },[]); return (

{trans[lang].billing.title}

handlePopover('20')} onMouseLeave={() => handlePopover('700')} /> {showPopover && renderPopover()} {/* Top bar */}

** {trans[lang].pricing.noCardRequired}

Aug 4, 2020 $10.00 {trans[lang].billingPayments.paid} Nadia Mkhinini 1 x Basic Plan Aug 4 - Sep 3 {trans[lang].billingPayments.view}
Sep 4, 2020 $10.00 {trans[lang].billingPayments.unpaid} Nadia Mkhinini 1 x Pro Plan Aug 4 - Sep 3 {trans[lang].billingPayments.view}
}
) } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { lang : state.socialMediaR.lang, socialMediaPageSelected : state.socialMediaR.socialMediaPageSelected, pricingInfos : state.billingR.pricingInfos, currency : state.billingR.currency, } }; export default connect(mapStateToProps, { resetSocialMediaSelections, getPricingInfos, detectCurrency })(Billing);
